    • Method Detail

      • ByteArrayToImage

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image ByteArrayToImage(byte[] bytes,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        java.util.logging.Logger logger)
                                                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        A method which generate a Image instance from byte array.
        Parameters:
        bytes - byte array which will be parsed to Image instance.
        logger - An optional logger, will be used if the parsing process failed.
        Returns:
        A Image if the parsing succeed, null if the parsing process failed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if one of the received parameter is null.

      • ImageToByteArray

        public static byte[] ImageToByteArray(javafx.scene.image.Image image,
                                      java.lang.String imageType,
                                      @Nullable
                                      java.util.logging.Logger logger)
                               throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        A method which generate a InputStream from Image instance.
        Parameters:
        image - Image instance that will be generated to InputStream.
        imageType - The image file extension, for example: "jpg", "jpeg", "png", etc.
        logger - An optional logger, will be used if the parsing process failed.
        Returns:
        A byte array if the parsing succeed, null if the parsing process failed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if one of the parameters is null (or the String is empty).

      • ImageToInputStream

        public static java.io.InputStream ImageToInputStream(javafx.scene.image.Image image,
                                                     java.lang.String imageType,
                                                     @Nullable
                                                     java.util.logging.Logger logger)
                                              throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        A method which generate a InputStream from Image instance.
        Parameters:
        image - Image instance that will be generated to InputStream.
        imageType - The image file extension, for example: "jpg", "jpeg", "png", etc.
        logger - An optional logger, will be used if the parsing process failed.
        Returns:
        A InputStream if the parsing succeed, null if the parsing process failed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if one of the parameters is null (or the String is empty).

      • InputStreamToImage

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image InputStreamToImage(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                                          @Nullable
                                                          java.util.logging.Logger logger)
                                                   throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        A method which generate a Image instance from InputStream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - InputStream which will be parsed to Image instance.
        logger - An optional logger, will be used if the parsing process failed.
        Returns:
        A Image if the parsing succeed, null if the parsing process failed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if one of the received parameter is null.
